alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; Jackson; North Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 4:29PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jackson, central Walton, southern Holmes and Washington Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 329 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Eglin Air Force Base to 8 miles northeast of Marianna. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Chipley, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Marianna, Eglin Air Force Base, Chattahoochee, Bradford, Live Oak, Sneads, Freeport, Cottondale, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Ponce De Leon, Alford, Caryville, Wausau, Westville and Whitehead Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Holmes; Jackson; North Walton; Washington
